ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Here i go again :-P
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks so much Su...it just so happens that Amaiya (now on Fennin) was lucky enough to get two hatchets in her travels this weekend...This is great news and i
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks so much Su...it just so happens that Amaiya
(now on Fennin) was lucky enough to get two hatchets
in her travels this weekend...This is great news and i
will do as you have suggested...i have been hanging
around the lifts but have now made lvl 5 (all by
myself..WOOT)and will have to move on soon i think..no
more safety of knowing the guards there...lol...Gosh i
never knew i could have so much fun alone...is alot
easier because i am not frustrating the BF who has
been playing the game for a long time and cannot
understand why i sometimes just "don't get
it"...pffffffff...my thanks to all of you here who
have been such a HUGE help...Anyone on Fennin???? :-)

**hugs**
Amaiya, lvl 5 Wood Elf Druid, Loyal servant of Tunare
--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> Here's a quest to get a weapon better than rusty..
> Go to the Ranger guild (one level up from the druid
> guild) and find Dill
> Fireshine. He asks you to bring him two orc hatchets
> from the "blue
> meanies". The merchants sell them for 6pp a piece so
> it's not worth buying
> them. Just look for an orc pawn that has an axe.
> Check to make sure it's a
> hatchet and not a rusty axe. When you have two
> hatchets, give them to you
> and he usually gives you two weapons in return. If
> you can't use them or
> think they suck, then sell them to the merchant that
> you have the best
> faction with.
> Also, if you run around the area near the lifts and
> the ruins, sometimes a
> bright green patch spawns on the ground. It's
> evergreen leaves. They sell
> for about 2 to 5pp a piece depending on who your
> buyer is and how much they
> want to spend.
> If you're high enough to go into Butcherblock then
> start to follow the path
> (right after you zone in from Faydark) and instead
> of keeping to the path,
> run straight accross to the two houses (right thru
> the pit). along the way
> Oak Bark sometimes spawns on the ground. That is an
> item that sells for a
> good price too. It's rarer.
> That's assuming you are a woodelf druid though.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > I need to find a better Melee weapon for my young,
> on
> > her own Druid, Amaiya (Ayonae Ro). BF had
> suggested
> > asking around for a Fine Steel Scimitar but I have
> so
> > little money right now and the guy I talked to
> last
> > night wanted 10pp for the one he had...sheeeesh, I
> > don't even have 1pp yet...lol(but hey I am having
> > fun)..sow, no wait, that should be so, any
> suggestions
> > on a less expensive "weapon" and where i might
> find
> > it. I tend to hang out close to the lifts so I
> can
> > run like hell if I have to so if there is
> somewhere
> > near there that would be helpful...
> >
> > Wishing you all safe travels..
> >
> > Amaiya, the Evercurious
> > Druid, Ayonae Ro (aka as Naara)
> >
>
>
>
